structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Trustees may sue or be sued.
law.text: A majority of the trustees may sue or be sued in their own names on behalf of the religious society in any action concerning the property of the society.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 321.
